   20: 
   21: %%
   22: 
   23: -module(ssh_engine_SUITE).
   24: 
   25: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   26: -include("ssh_test_lib.hrl").
   27: 
   28: %% Note: This directive should only be used in test suites.
   29: -export([
   30:          suite/0,
   31:          all/0,
   32:          groups/0,
   33:          init_per_suite/1,
   34:          end_per_suite/1,
   35:          init_per_group/2,
   36:          end_per_group/2
   37:         ]).
   38: 
   39: -export([
   40:          simple_connect/1
   41:         ]).
   42: 
   43: 
   44: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   45: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   46: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   47: 
   48: suite() ->
   49:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   50:      {timetrap,{seconds,40}}].
   51: 
   52: all() -> 
   53:     [{group, dsa_key},
   54:      {group, rsa_key}
   55:     ].
   56: 
   57: groups() ->
   58:     [{dsa_key, [], basic_tests()},
   59:      {rsa_key, [], basic_tests()}
   60:     ].
   61: 
   62: basic_tests() ->
   63:     [simple_connect
   64:     ].
   65: 
   66: 
   67: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   68: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   69:     ssh:start(),
   70:     ?CHECK_CRYPTO(
   71:        case crypto:info_lib() of
   72:            [{_,_, <<"OpenSSL 1.0.1s-freebsd  1 Mar 2016">>}] ->
   73:                {skip, "Strange Engine stuff"};
   74: 
   75:            _ ->
   76:                case load_engine() of
   77:                    {ok,E} ->
   78:                        [{engine,E}|Config];
   79:                    {error, notsup} ->
   80:                        {skip, "Engine not supported on this OpenSSL version"};
   81:                    {error, bad_engine_id} ->
   82:                        {skip, "Dynamic Engine not supported"};
   83:                    {error, notexist} ->
   84:                        {skip, "No Dynamic Engine to test with"};
   85:                    Other ->
   86:                        ct:log("Engine load failed: ~p",[Other]),
   87:                        {fail, "Engine load failed"}
   88:                end
   89:        end
   90:       ).
   91: 
   92: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   93:     catch crypto:engine_unload( proplists:get_value(engine,Config) ),
   94:     ssh:stop().
   95: 
   96: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   97: init_per_group(dsa_key, Config) ->
   98:     case lists:member('ssh-dss',
   99: 		      ssh_transport:supported_algorithms(public_key)) of
  100: 	true ->
  101:             start_daemon(Config, 'ssh-dss', "dsa_private_key.pem");
  102: 	false ->
  103: 	    {skip, unsupported_pub_key}
  104:     end;
  105: init_per_group(rsa_key, Config) ->
  106:     case lists:member('ssh-rsa',
  107: 		      ssh_transport:supported_algorithms(public_key)) of
  108: 	true ->
  109:             start_daemon(Config, 'ssh-rsa', "rsa_private_key.pem");
  110: 	false ->
  111: 	    {skip, unsupported_pub_key}
  112:     end.
  113: 
  114: start_daemon(Config, KeyType, KeyId) ->
  115:     SystemDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  116:     FullKeyId = filename:join(SystemDir, KeyId),
  117:     KeyCBOpts = [{engine, proplists:get_value(engine,Config)},
  118:                  {KeyType, FullKeyId}
  119:                 ],
  120:     Opts = [{key_cb, {ssh_key_cb_engine_keys, KeyCBOpts}},
  121:             {modify_algorithms, [{append, [{public_key,[KeyType]}]}]}
  122:            ],
  123:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:std_daemon(Config, Opts),
  124:     [{host_port,{Host,Port}}, {daemon_pid,Pid}, {key_type,KeyType}| Config].
  125: 
  126: 
  127: end_per_group(_, Config) ->
  128:     catch ssh:stop_daemon(proplists:get_value(daemon_pid,Config)),
  129:     Config.
  130: 
  131: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  132: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  133: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  134: 
  135: %% A simple exec call
  136: simple_connect(Config) ->
  137:     {Host,Port} = proplists:get_value(host_port, Config),
  138:     KeyType = proplists:get_value(key_type, Config),
  139:     Opts = [
  140:             {modify_algorithms, [{append, [{public_key,[KeyType]}]}]}
  141:            ],
  142:     CRef = ssh_test_lib:std_connect(Config, Host, Port, Opts),
  143:     ssh:close(CRef).
  144: 
  145: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  146: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  147: load_engine() ->
  148:     case crypto:get_test_engine() of
  149:         {ok, Engine} ->
  150:             try
  151:                 %% The test engine has it's own fake rsa sign/verify that
  152:                 %% you don't want to use, so exclude it from methods to load:
  153:                 Methods = 
  154:                     crypto:engine_get_all_methods() -- [engine_method_rsa],
  155:                 crypto:engine_load(<<"dynamic">>,
  156:                                    [{<<"SO_PATH">>, Engine},
  157:                                     <<"LOAD">>],
  158:                                    [],
  159:                                    Methods
  160:                                   )
  161:             catch
  162:                 error:notsup ->
  163:                     {error, notsup}
  164:             end;
  165: 
  166:         {error, Error} ->
  167:             {error, Error}
  168:     end.
  169:
